title: My First Post In The New Digs
description: A total re-design of my website, focusing on a modern, versatile, and open authoring and design experience using Next.js, TinaCMS, and Git.

body.content:
Hello and welcome to my new website. This website will serve as the home for my thoughts, and an open forum for discussion about them.

I look forward to sharing a little bit about:

* My thoughts on systems thinking, design, software development. üë®‚Äçüíª
* My thoughts on the JAMStack, Static Web Applications, and serverless. ü§ì
* My personal thinking of philosophy, and what makes the world tick. ü§î

I'll also be covering just how this site works, including:

* Setting up Next.js with a [Medium.com](https://medium.com)-like theme.
* Setting up Next.js with TinaCMS, an open source editing toolkit.
* Deploying Next.js to Vercel, to get [isomorphic rendering](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isomorphic_JavaScript).
* Setting up Web Mentions to get access to social networking features.

Stay tuned, as this nerd is looking forward to sharing his thoughts with you.

Until next time,

Chris Macrae
